attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please stop charities advertising on television.  With being disabled myself & unable to work, I can hardly afford to live off money I get.  Without begging charities on tv.  For just £2.00 a month.  It makes people like myself feel worse, because I am unable to afford to give to the charity.  & we don't need that right in our faces.  So please stop charities advertising on TV.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
